name: Resting in red
description:
Aníbal Argañaraz. png. 4096 x 4096 px. Digital painting from Serie: "What was left of Summer" and it was exhibited in an individual show at "Vocación Humana" Foundation in Buenos Aires, Argentina between October and November 2019.

Summer as a catalyst of sensations and emotions: the memory of a chilhood not so distant, the sound of the sea, a walk along the shore or just floating...
